Comment.value:
Class Customizations:

There is no longer a 5 level cap.  However, this class will only be available to those with the custom hak.

Prerequisites:
Feats: 
Toughness, Weapon proficiency (martial), heavy Armor proficiency
Skills: 
Discipline 8, Spellcraft 5, Lore 5
Proficiencies: 
none

Base Attack Bonus: + 1 per level
Primary Saving Throws: Will
Hit Die: d10
Skill Points: 4 + Intelligence Modifier
Class Skills: 
craft armor, craft trap, craft weapon, discipline, intimidate, lore, persuade, Parry
Epic Bonus Feats: 
Armor Skin, Devastating Critical, Epic Prowess, Epic Toughness, Great Strength, Great Constitution, Overwhelming Critical 

Level 1: Fear. 

Level 3: Final Stand.

Level 5: Heroic Shield, Sacred Aura.

Level 7: Inspire Courage.

Level 9: Rallying Cry.

Level 10: Oath of Wrath.

Level 13: Valiance.

Level 14: Bonus Feat.

Level 15: Pious Demand.

Level 17: Bonus Feat.

Level 20: Vengeance, Bonus Feat.

Level 23: Bonus Feat.

Level 26: Bonus Feat.

Level 29: Bonus Feat.

Level 40: Virtue.


Feat Customizations:

Fear: 
The enemies Spell casters are targeted by a fear and suffer a reduced Spell DC of -1 per 8 PDK levels. (To a maximum of -6 each.)  Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Final Stand: 
Minor Globe of invulnerability becomes Globe of invulnerability at level 20.  Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Heroic Shield: 
+1 per 5 levels of Dodge Armor class to all allies in a 20m range. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Inspire Courage: 
Adds +1 AB and +2 Slashing Damage per 10 PDK levels to all allies. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Oath of Wrath: 
+1 ab, +2% extra damage (melee/ranged attacks) per 8 PDK levels vs the selected target to a maximum of +5 & 10%.  Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.  NOTE: this is usable only vs Monsters, and is effective only vs the monster targeted.  The AB is not counted against the ab cap and therefore is in the combat log only.

Pious Demand: 
(kneel before the Gods) All targets in a colossal radius take 1d12 per PDK level in Electrical Damage, no save.  Targets must make a reflex save calculated 10 + PDK level or be knockdown for 1d2 rounds.

Rallying Cry: 
Increases Spell Resistance by +1 per 2 PDK levels (+20 max) for 1 round per 2 PDK levels to all allies in a 20m range.

Sacred Rite: 
All allies within 20m of the PDK receive +1 per 8 PDK levels to spell DC (to a maximum of +6). Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Valiance: 
All evil creatures within 5 meters of the caster must make a Will save Vs PDK level or be blinded.

Vengeance: 
Once per day a PDK can do a harm like attack on any creature that has killed either himself/herself or one of his allies.  The attack must occur within 5 rounds of the death and the ally killed must still be present in the game.  Boss like creatures are immune to this.

Virtue: 
All PDK buffs apply to self as well including the following:
Base Strength of 40: All allies near the PDK receive and extra 2d12 sonic damage.
Base Dexterity of 40: All allies near the PDK receive 60% concealment.
Base Constitution of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a 5% immunity to physicals. This stacks will all other forms of damage Immunity
Base Intelligence of 40: All allies near the PDK receive an Armor AC of 12.
Base Wisdom of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a +12 to all saves.
Base Charisma of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a bonus to their AB of +5.

Class Customizations:

There is no longer a 5 level cap. However, this class will only be available to those with the custom hak.

Prerequisites:
Feats: 
Toughness, Weapon proficiency (martial), heavy Armor proficiency
Skills: 
Discipline 8, Spellcraft 5, Lore 5
Proficiencies: 
none

Base Attack Bonus: + 1 per level
Primary Saving Throws: Will
Hit Die: d10
Skill Points: 4 + Intelligence Modifier
Class Skills: 
craft armor, craft trap, craft weapon, discipline, intimidate, lore, persuade, Parry
Epic Bonus Feats: 
Armor Skin, Devastating Critical, Epic Prowess, Epic Toughness, Great Strength, Great Constitution, Overwhelming Critical 

Level 1: Fear. 

Level 3: Final Stand.

Level 5: Heroic Shield, Sacred Aura.

Level 7: Inspire Courage.

Level 9: Rallying Cry.

Level 10: Oath of Wrath.

Level 13: Valiance.

Level 14:Bonus Feat.

Level 15: Pious Demand.

Level 17:Bonus Feat.

Level 20:Vengeance, Bonus Feat.

Level 23:Bonus Feat.

Level 26:Bonus Feat.

Level 29:Bonus Feat.

Level 40:Virtue.


Feat Customizations:

Fear: 
The enemies Spell casters are targeted by a fear and suffer a reduced Spell DC of -1 per 8 PDK levels. (To a maximum of -6 each.) Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Final Stand: 
Minor Globe of invulnerability becomes Globe of invulnerability at level 20. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Heroic Shield: 
+1 per 5 levels of Dodge Armor class to all allies in a 20m range. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Inspire Courage: 
Adds +1 AB and +2 Slashing Damage per 10 PDK levels to all allies. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Oath of Wrath: 
+1 ab, +2% extra damage (melee/ranged attacks) per 8 PDK levels vs the selected target to a maximum of +5 & 10%. Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels. NOTE: this is usable only vs Monsters, and is effective only vs the monster targeted. The AB is not counted against the ab cap and therefore is in the combat log only.

Pious Demand: 
(kneel before the Gods) All targets in a colossal radius take 1d12 per PDK level in Electrical Damage, no save. Targets must make a reflex save calculated 10 + PDK level or be knockdown for 1d2 rounds.

Rallying Cry: 
Increases Spell Resistance by +1 per 2 PDK levels (+20 max) for 1 round per 2 PDK levels to all allies in a 20m range.

Sacred Rite: 
All allies within 20m of the PDK receive +1 per 8 PDK levels to spell DC (to a maximum of +6). Duration: 1 round per 2 PDK levels.

Valiance: 
All evil creatures within 5 meters of the caster must make a Will save Vs PDK level or be blinded.

Vengeance:
Once per day a PDK can do a harm like attack on any creature that has killed either himself/herself or one of his allies. The attack must occur within 5 rounds of the death and the ally killed must still be present in the game. Boss like creatures are immune to this.

Virtue: 
All PDK buffs apply to self as well including the following:
Base Strength of 40: All allies near the PDK receive and extra 2d12 sonic damage.
Base Dexterity of 40: All allies near the PDK receive 60% concealment.
Base Constitution of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a 5% immunity to physicals. This stacks will all other forms of damage Immunity
Base Intelligence of 40: All allies near the PDK receive an Armor AC of 12.
Base Wisdom of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a +12 to all saves.
Base Charisma of 40: All allies near the PDK receive a bonus to their AB of +5.
